linkedinPosts.originalContent:
Most advisors tell you about ‚Çπ1.5L under 80C. Top advisors add ‚Çπ50K more through NPS!

I had a client earning ‚Çπ2 crore annually.
Smart. Successful. Savvy investor.

But paying ‚Çπ62 lakh in taxes.

Until we discovered the family tax optimization strategy:

Self: ‚Çπ2 lakh deduction (80C + 80CCD)
Spouse: ‚Çπ2 lakh deduction
Parents: ‚Çπ1 lakh (80D senior citizen)

Total family deduction: ‚Çπ5 LAKH
Tax saved at 31% slab: ‚Çπ1,55,000 annually

Over 10 years? ‚Çπ15.5 LAKH saved.
Plus investment growth: ‚Çπ35+ lakh additional wealth.

That's ‚Çπ50 LAKH difference.

Same income. Same family.
Different strategy. Generational impact.

The elite secret:
‚Üí Individual planning saves thousands
‚Üí Family planning saves lakhs
‚Üí Generational planning creates crores

March 31 deadline: 6 months away.

Are you optimizing alone?
Or planning as a family?

P.S. Most advisors plan individual.
Top advisors plan families.
Exceptional advisors plan generations.

Shriya Vallabh Petkar | Empowering Financial Decisions

linkedinPosts.originalContent:
I watched my client lose ‚Çπ3 lakhs in taxes last year.

Not because they didn't earn enough.
Not because they didn't invest.

Because they didn't know about the extra ‚Çπ50,000 deduction.

Everyone talks about 80C (‚Çπ1.5 lakh).
Nobody mentions 80CCD(1B) (‚Çπ50,000 extra through NPS).

Total possible: ‚Çπ2 LAKH tax deduction.
What most people use: ‚Çπ1.5 lakh.
The gap: ‚Çπ50,000 x 31% tax = ‚Çπ15,500 lost EVERY year.

Over 10 years?
That's ‚Çπ1.55 lakhs gone. Plus growth you never got.

The brutal truth?

Your CA might not tell you this.
Your bank RM definitely won't.
Even some advisors miss it.

But here's what winners do:

1. Max out 80C ‚Üí ‚Çπ1.5L (ELSS/PPF/NPS Tier-I)
2. Add 80CCD(1B) ‚Üí Extra ‚Çπ50K (NPS only)
3. Use 80D ‚Üí Health insurance deductions
4. Calculate old vs new tax regime

Total possible tax savings: ‚Çπ46,800+ per year.

March 31 deadline: 6 months away.

Are you maximizing every rupee?

P.S. That client who lost ‚Çπ3L? Now saves ‚Çπ50K annually.
Still regrets not knowing earlier.

Shriya Vallabh Petkar | Empowering Financial Decisions
ARN: ARN-147852

#TaxPlanning #WealthCreation #FinancialFreedom #MutualFunds #NPS
